items.sentence: Tom has called me many times in the last 24 hours.

Tom used to live by himself. Now he lives with us.
Tom and Mary both live on the outskirts of Boston.
Make it three million dollars, and we have a deal.
It looked like someone was in Tom's room with him.
I not only study English, but I also study French.
Tom wasn't our interpreter. He was our tour guide.

Spanish and Portuguese are very similar languages.

Nothing exciting ever seems to happen around here.
